ac:rich-text-body.p: This page has been generated with a tool.

p: Text formatted with bold, italic, monospace, underline and strikethrough.
Text with subscript (H2O or H2O) and superscript (e-ix or e-ix).
Text in red, green and blue.
Highlight in teal, lime and yellow.
Absolute link to an external location with a query string.

p: UTF-8 characters outside of the ASCII range are also supported: e.g. árvíztűrő tükörfúrógép.
Some HTML entities are supported, e.g. © or ¶.
